ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

cookingTips: Drain artichokes and spinach well to avoid a watery dip
Mix all ingredients thoroughly before baking for even flavor
Serve warm with crackers or bread for best results
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user toward a creamy, well-integrated dip by emphasizing proper ingredient drainage and thorough mixing.
